1. A copy of all advertised and/or unadvertised, (internal and external), supervisory/management, (GS-13 and GS-14), vacancy announcements, for all USDA agencies and offices, in calendar year 2011. The vacancy announcements must include (the job title/series and grades). The reason for selecting GS-13 & GS-14 is that these grades appear to be the 1st step into a management career in the federal government; 2. The total number of all vacant supervisory/management (GS-13 and GS-14) positions advertised in calendar year 2011 for all USDA agencies and offices; 3. The number of applicants that made the best-qualified list for the management position advertised; 4. The names of the individuals from the best-qualified list that received interviews. merit promotion) and externally for the management positions; 5. The interview questions that were used by the various USDA agencies to interview the individuals for the supervisory/management positions; 6. What is the process used to determine the interview questions that are used when interviewing applicants? Is there a standardized list of interview questions? How are the questions generated, who selects the questions, and how do the questions compare to the competencies needed for the position? 7. What is the process used by the servicing personnel office that allows an individual to make the best-qualified list? In other words, what is the weeding out process for those who will not make the best-qualified list? 8. Please provide the evaluation process used of the interview questions. For example, how are answers and/or responses to interview questions rated and ranked? 9. Please provide the list of individuals who made the best-qualified list; 10. Please provide the list of individuals who received an interview based on the best-qualified list. The best-qualified list (should contain applicant information) for all applicants that applied internally (merit promotion) and externally for the management positions; and 11. Please identify: a. Names of the applicants that applied externally for the management positions. b. Names of the applicants that applied internally for the management positions. c. The number of individuals selected as merit promotion that made the best-qualified list. d. The number of individuals selected externally that made the best-qualified list.
